snippet: The technology reporters and editors of The New York Times scour the Web each day for important and peculiar items. Wednesday's selection includes a strange patent from I.B.M., something hard-copy books can do that e-books cannot and ignoring the...
abstract: The technology reporters and editors of The New York Times scour the Web each day for important and peculiar items. Wednesday's selection includes a strange patent from I.B.M., something hard-copy books can do that e-books cannot and ignoring the Consumer Electronics Show.
lead_paragraph: Interesting things that New York Times reporters and editors found on the Web on Wednesday. Find more Scuttlebot items here.

headline.main: Today's Scuttlebot: Statistics Quants and Some Frisky Books
